p: The NADESs polarity was measured by the solvatochromic dye Nile red [ 4]. The dye was dissolved in each NADES in the concentration range 0.01–0.1 mM and absorption spectra were recorded. The λ max was used to calculate the molar transition energy ENR, based on the equation: ENR = hc NA/λ max = 28,591/λ max, (ENR in kcal/mol, λ max in nm).
